catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 501
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: woodblock printed book; images of performances happening inside and outside of a building complex; a blueprint or planning chart; images of exaggerated characters; dragons, demons; people reading; puppeteers; gray cover with brown and green pinecone and pine needle design; yellow and pink labels on front cover
markings: Marks on pink label front cover, in pencil: [204 / IV]; mark inside front cover, URC, in pencil: [IV]; Seal inside front cover, LRC: [Settei]
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Encyclopedia of Musical Theater Performances (Seikyoku ruisan 声曲類纂), vol. 5
